Legal_Issue: Does the Applicant meet the criteria under subsection 129.2(4) of the Customs Act to qualify for an extension of time to request a decision of the Minister regarding the NPAs?
Application_Facts: The Applicant failed to act within the 90-day period, did not demonstrate inability to act or instruct another person, and lacked a bona fide intention to request a decision. Evidence showed awareness of the NPAs but no action taken.
Decision_Outcome: The application for an extension of time is dismissed.
Remedy_Requested: Extension of time to request a decision of the Minister regarding the NPAs
Court_Ruling: Application dismissed; costs awarded to Respondent
Defendant_Behavior: Failure to comply with provisions of the Customs Act leading to penalty assessments
Grounds_for_Claim: Applicant sought an extension of time through administrative and judicial processes after missing the initial deadline
Legal_Standard: Under subsection 129.2(4), an extension is granted if: (a) the application was made within one year after the 90-day period; (b) the applicant demonstrates inability to act or a bona fide intention to request a decision within the 90 days; (c) it would be just and equitable to grant the application; and (d) the application was made as soon as circumstances permitted.
Assessment_Factor: Inability to act, bona fide intention, just and equitable consideration, timeliness of application
Procedural_Issue: Missed deadline for requesting a decision on NPAs; late application for extension of time
Evidence_Used: Evidence showed awareness of the NPAs but no action taken
Application_Basis: Request for extension of time under subsection 129.2(4)
Evidence_Assessed: Awareness of NPAs without subsequent action
Relief_Sought: Extension of time to challenge penalty assessments
Evidentiary_Deficiency: No demonstration of inability to act or bona fide intention
Cause_Description: Failure to comply with provisions of the Customs Act leading to penalty assessments
Evidence_Issues: Lack of evidence showing inability to act or intention to appeal
Evidence_Assessment: Applicant aware of NPAs but took no action within required timeframe
Decision_Rationale: Applicant does not meet the criteria under subsection 129.2(4): failed to act within 90 days, no demonstrated inability, no bona fide intention, and delay not justified
Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence to support grounds for extension
